website_summaries.verdict: May look delicate but is a highly-efficient teaching tool.
pros: Offers a light and clean look
We love that there is rarely leftover ink after cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Look And works Well
customer_reviews.text: This was a pleasant surprise. It was easy to assemble/install. My daughter helped me and we got it installed in my office in about 30 minutes. The drywall anchors are a little flimsy, so be careful about the drill bit size you use to predrill. The directions don't say what size to use. It looks very good and the eraser is also classy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G. Boldt

customer_reviews.title: Simple install, great results
customer_reviews.text: We purchased both the 48" and 72" boards for our office. Of the 11 boards we purchased, the quality was consistent, install was clear and easy and they look extremely clean and professional. Say goodbye to the stained whiteboards that make your office and conference rooms look unsightly. We even hung one vertical and everything lined up nicely, after a bit of simple math to recalculate their recommended hanging measurements.
customer_reviews.author: jnk

customer_reviews.title: very easy to hang and use
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty darn easy to hang on the wall. I purchased this through Amazon's used section. Came in great/new shape with new hardware to secure in the wall. We have used this glass board for over a few months - no staining (make sure you buy glass dry-erase markers), and wipes clean in one swipe.
customer_reviews.author: dP

customer_reviews.title: Modern white boards, smart and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Modern beautiful in design and function, I ordered 8 of these glass white boards for my company when we moved to our new office because I'm tired of the ghost left over from the old whiteboard. Everyone loves them, they look great and I love that they are 36" wide so I can actually reach the top of the boards vs 48". Over all quality product, fantastic styling. Smart and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Emily P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Glass Whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous glass whiteboard. Our office has a 60" x 36" and a few 48" x 36"'s. All are fantastic. They mark well, clean easily, and leave no ghosting marks. We plan to keep these for as long as possible. Install on this particular board is a bit challenging compared to the glass whiteboards on Amazon. Proper measurement and use of a leveler is a must. Don't rush the install.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: It's fancy- just a little delicate
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than a normal dry erase board, no worries of accidentally using a permanent marker and ruining it. It';s very sleek and modern looking. It's not the easiest thing to install, but with patience it works. The only issue I had is one of the little hangers that hold the little pen tray ripped from the lower mount. Have not been able to fix that now that it's hung.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Allen

customer_reviews.title: These floating glass whiteboards have a great aesthetic compared to the old laminated chipboard type
customer_reviews.text: These floating glass whiteboards have a great aesthetic compared to the old laminated chipboard type. However this thing is a bear to mount. You have to pre-drill all the holes with very little room for error and hope its lines up. The larger boards are definitely a two person job.
customer_reviews.author: T-Hawk

customer_reviews.title: This glass is better than dry erase material.
customer_reviews.text: We love the board in our kitchen. Easy erase glass is much better than dry erase material. The only improvement could be a version without their logo on the face.
customer_reviews.author: Curiouseur

customer_reviews.title: Incredible design and attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: This thing is all around excellent. The instructions were clear and easy to follow and the mounting mechanism is ingenious. It made installation a breeze. The whiteboard is extremely high quality and every little detail is a perfect marriage of form and function. I was a little skeptical about paying the extra money for a glass board but this item is totally worth it. It’s an incredible value for such a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great and has lasted
customer_reviews.text: I installed the board in my office's main conference room 6 years ago. After much use it still works great and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: rdagger

customer_reviews.title: easy to install compared to the design of other brands.
customer_reviews.text: It's also a whiter white than older iceberg boards. I like this much better and it doesn't match the other Iceberg in the room we bought it for /=
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Looks beautiful and no ghosting! The marker tray is brilliant as well being unobtrusive and low profile. Easy to install to!
customer_reviews.author: K. W. Regis

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive, high quality glass board. The downside is that print from a dry erase marker, while still legible, is not as sharp and bright as on a new ceramic board. But the longevity and overall attractiveness of this glass board makes it a better choice overall.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Pape

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise, minimalist clean look.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting some light grayish board to come in because of a previous answer on a question, but when it came in it was actually very white (which was a nice surprise). I was originally going to get a Clarus white board but this was a fraction of the price and looks beautiful on the wall. Hired someone off of craigslist to help me put it up, maybe a half an hour job. I found that the Quartet bold markers show up very well on the board. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Shi

customer_reviews.title: Very Cleanable
customer_reviews.text: We use these boards often. My only complaint, I wish they wouldn’t have their logo in the lower corner. When we install them vertically it looks like we goofed. Lose the logo or cant it at a 45° angle this way it won’t matter which way we hang them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my office. Easy install and looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: RMcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Sturday and no Ghosting.
customer_reviews.text: While the installation process is a bit complicated, once you understand how to mount it, the finished product is amazing. It's secure in my office wall and there is no ghosting at all.
customer_reviews.author: FakeNamesRuleSupreme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and well engineered. Measure twice, drill once though when mounting. The mount clips are well engineered. When using the glass whiteboard, lettering was crisp and bold.
customer_reviews.author: glasdriver

customer_reviews.title: love the looks. worried about long term durability
customer_reviews.text: Glass is supposed to be superior to acrylic because it will not stain. That is true. However after you erase the board there is a greassy residue. Is not that bad to eliminate it but is there. The white color is achieve by painting the back of the glass. My concern with durability comes from the fact that the paint was a little bit chipping in some borders (is not really noticeable at all but it is there). Packaging was impeccable. I love the look and how things are easily erased,
customer_reviews.author: G. Castro

customer_reviews.title: This is a great board that can be mounted horizontally or vertically
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board that can be mounted horizontally or vertically. Much better looking than a big white slab on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: John Q Public

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this whiteboard in the kitchen. Simple installation if you're at least a little handy.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this sleek design!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleek dry erase board & it was easy to install and use. We get lots of compliments on this board.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Mize

customer_reviews.title: Great whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: Great whiteboard - maybe the best I've used. I had a little more trouble mounting it than others seem to have had (margin of error is small), but eventually got it right. Looks great, functional, and obviously less expensive than many inferior whiteboards.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at an excellent price. Ordering many more for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It's really steady, sexy and smooth!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. I am considering one for home as well.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put up and the rubber liners that hold the glass are tough to wrangle with. But I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: whodathunk?

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just excellent! It meets our needs perfectly and it's easy to install and maintain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it writes nicely. Takes some pressure if erasing with the large ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say the exact quality as I had to reorder 3 times due to packaging issues and lost items. I now have a "new" board with scratches in the paint. However, it writes nicely. Takes some pressure if erasing with the large silver eraser that matches; however, I may just look for different markers. The marker tray isn't as sturdy as I expected but the rest is decent
customer_reviews.author: Lacey J. Fleckenstein

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality and look of it
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and look of it. One issue I wish the designers would design an easier way to mount the board.
customer_reviews.author: Ghiskhan

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: No complainants and looks great. Highly recommended. Installation may require assistance, but not a big deal. Get the matching eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Man

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic marker board
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic marker board. It's my first glass one and it was the cheapest I could find. Had to send back because the packaging of the item was really bad and the white coating was easily scratched. Luckily the return process was simple and painless and we had a new one in a week. I put two of these up in the office. Very easy to mount. Get the matching eraser. Looks cool and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Santner

customer_reviews.title: Nice contemporary whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one, then another, and finally purchased 4 of the large white boards. We rate them at a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. It's packaged well, easy to assemble and mount on the wall. Pays for itself since you don't have to buy white board cleaning fluid. It's also very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Killen

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern whiteboard!
customer_reviews.text: Very modern whiteboard! I love it. Writing on the glass screen takes some getting used to, but it's really nice. Installation requires some experience to line things up straight.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Need to find pens that can write darker
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Need to find pens that can write darker. There is a small shadow that casts on the writing from the thickness of the glass reflection of the white background. Looks great though. Much nicer than traditional wipe board
customer_reviews.author: Allen K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boards are awesome. They look nice, erase easily, and look classy.
customer_reviews.author: S A Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great product - TERRIBLE seller
customer_reviews.text: Update to an earlier review where the package came with a bracket slightly damaged. The seller "pcrush-outlet" was very slow to respond so finally had to get Amazon involved. Then they wanted me to repackage the entire white board, meet a carrier's semi-truck several blocks away, and return it. Get real!! So I did what they could (and should) have done. Called up Iceberg on their 800 number, talked to a great service rep, they will send me a complimentary fresh bracket. Problem solved. Love the product, love the manufacturer's service, even like the shipping company. But stay far away from pcrush-outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley K Hunt

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing at my office
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing at my office. I got these instead of normal dry erase boards and this looks way more modern and does t fall apart like the cheap boards.
customer_reviews.author: kris lapp

product_meta.title: Iceberg ICE31140 Clarity Glass Dry Erase Whiteboard, 48" Length x 1" Width x 36" Height
product_meta.description: Size:48x36 InchesIceberg Full Circle Clarity TOO glass dry erase collaboration board. High-tech architectural aluminum mounting brackets with accessory marker/eraser tray. The Clarity series exemplifies cutting edge design and function. For ultimate high performance, the writing surface is 1/4-inches tempered glass. An ultra white backing, combined with the glass surface, maximize visibility, clarity and ease of erasing and cleaning. This surface will never ghost. Designed with function, sustainability and lean manufacture in mind, the new Full Circle Series of collaboration boards from Iceberg employ materials that are recycled or may be easily recycled after use. Creative use of bio board substrates and recyclable materials like aluminum and glass result in products that do not waste resources, are attractively designed, provide outstanding performance and long lasting use.
feature_bullets: Frameless 1/4" tempered glass non-ghosting writing surface mounts to wall with included hidden hardware
Ultra-white backing combines with white surface to maximize visibility, clarity and ease of cleaning and erasing
Aluminum channels support a high-tech rail to capture markers and an eraser tray
